text_input: Usay di best tem fo plant mangro?
output: Di best tem fo plant mangro na dry season en rainy season junction, so di tri go get bɔku wɛta fo grow fayn.

text_input: Usay di best gron fo grow cassava?
output: Cassava lek sandy en loamy gron we no too get bɔku wata en no too hard.

text_input: How fo prɛvɛnt pest pan mi rice farm?
output: Fo prɛvɛnt pest dem, you fo clean di farm well, use organic pesticide, en plant resistant rice variety.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi mango dem nor di ripe good?
output: Check if di mangro dem bin pick too early. Lef dem pan tri lɛngka, or wrap dem wit banana leaf fo ripen fayn.

text_input: Usay di best tem fo harvest mangro?
output: Di best tem fo harvest mangro na wɛn di skin don begin change color en e di pull easy from di tri.
You fo use compost, rotate crop dem, en avoid too much chemical fertilizer fo keep di gron healthy.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi gron dry en no get wɛta?
output: You fo practice mulching, dig small trench fo keep wata, en use drought-resistant crop dem.

text_input: How fo stop cut-cut grass (grasscutter) pan mi farm?
output: Build fence, set trap dem, en keep di area clean so di animal dem nor go get place fo hide.
Organic farming na wɛ wi nor di use chemical pesticide en fertilizer, but wi di use natural way dem fo grow food.

text_input: How fo store harvested corn fayn?
output: Dry di corn well, keep am na dry place, en use airtight container fo prɛvɛnt insect dem.

input_text: Wetin fo do if mi cassava nor di grow big?
output_text: Make sure say di gron loose en get bɛtɛ drainage. Use improved cassava cuttings en avoid planting dem too close.
Plant tomato na well-drained loamy gron, give dem bɔku sunlight, en use organic compost fo bɛtɛ yield.

input_text: Wetin fo do if grasshopper dem di eat mi crop dem?
output_text: Use neem leaf spray, encourage bird dem fo eat di insect dem, en hand-pick di grasshopper dem early morning.
Plant groundnut na sandy loam gron, space dem well, en plant during early rainy season fo bɛtɛ result.

input_text: Wetin fo do if mi cocoa di get black pod disease?
output_text: Prune di tree, remove infected pod dem quick, en use copper-based fungicide fo prɛvɛnt spread.

input_text: How fo control weed pan mi farm?
output_text: Use mulch, weed by hand or use hoe early before dem grow big, en rotate crop dem.

input_text: Wetin na di best way fo store potato?
output_text: Store potato na cool, dry place we get good ventilation. Nor wash dem before storage.
Plant banana sucker na moist gron, space dem well, en water dem bɔku but nor make e soak.

input_text: How climate change di affect farming?
output_text: Climate change di cause drought, heavy rain, en new pest dem. Farmers fo use drought-resistant crops en adapt farming practices.

input_text: Wetin fo do if mi pepper plant di dry fast?
output_text: Mulch around di plant fo keep moisture, water dem early morning or late evening, en avoid over-exposure to sun.

input_text: How fo bɛtɛ yield fo okro?
output_text: Plant okro na well-drained soil, space dem good, en harvest dem early so new pod go grow.

input_text: How fo make compost fo mi farm?
output_text: Mix dry leaf, green plant waste, en animal manure inside one pile, turn am every two weeks until e rot good.

input_text: Wetin na di best way fo store palm oil?
output_text: Store palm oil na cool, dry place inside airtight container. Avoid direct sunlight fo prɛvɛnt spoilage.
Plant pineapple sucker na sandy loamy gron, give dem bɔku sunlight, en nor water dem too much.

input_text: How fo protect mi rice farm from birds?
output_text: Use scarecrow, make noise with tin can dem, en cover di rice with net fo protect am.

input_text: Wetin na di sign say corn don ready fo harvest?
output_text: Di husk go begin dry, di silk go turn brown, en if you press di corn grain e go hard small.

input_text: How fo bɛtɛ di quality of palm kernel oil?
output_text: Use fresh palm kernel, dry dem well before processing, en avoid contamination with dirt.

input_text: How fo prɛvɛnt soil erosion pan mi farm?
output_text: Use contour farming, plant grass strip dem, en nor over-cultivate di land.

input_text: How fo preserve mango fo long tem?
output_text: Dry di mango slice dem, or store fresh one inside fridge inside plastic container.
